metadata.title: CVE-2020-8185 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in Rails <6.0.3.2 that allowed an untrusted user to run any pending migrations on a Rails app running in production.

notes.note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
